attributes.action: Require that the congestion charge be used only to limit the ammount of congestion and to therefore make all vehicles pay the same charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Mayor of London recently announced a £25 charge for 'higher polluting vehicles' and a £0 charge for 'lower polluting vehicles’ to enter the congestion charging zone.
 
The congestion charging zone is a zone that exists to reduce congestion in central London, not to penalise higher polluting vehicles for the amount they pollute.

All types of vehicles (be they lower or higher polluting) contribute the same amount to congestion to London. 

Because of these two statements, we the undersigned request that the congestion charge should apply to all vehicles equally, no matter how much they pollute. 

Pollution tax should be taken care of by vehicle excise duty banding. 

Lastly, residents living within the zone who use higher polluting vehicles should still be eligible for the same discount as other people living within the zone who used less polluting vehicles.
